chapter.text: A L. R. These (list) bol proofs this rezervovat si wisdom

Je it i vela z zazrak ludia ze my inspirovat clovek them? He inspirovat say Ona warn ludia dat dobry zvest those kto verit they attained position prominence ich Lord disbelievers said This bol inteligentny kuzelnik

Tvoj iba Lord bol GOD Jeden created heavens zem 6 dni potom assumed all authority He controls all zalezitost. There nie bol intercessor v accordance s Jeho will Such bol GOD tvoj Lord Ona kult Him. Ona nie berie heed

Do Him bol tvoj ultimate spatny listok all z ona. This bol GOD's truthful promise He zasvatit creation potom repeats it v poradie reward those verit lead righteous zivot equitably! Mat rad for those disbelieve they incur hellish pne painful retribution for ich disbelieving
He je Jeden rendered sun radiant moon lahky He zamyslat its phases ona learn pocitat rocnik calculate GOD NIE create all this except for specific UCEL. He explains revelations ludia zauzlit
Iste do alternation z night dni co GOD created heavens zem there bol proofs ludia bol righteous
Those nie expecting schodza us preoccupied this worldly zivot som content it refuse heed our proofs
these incurred Hell ich ultimate abode consequence ich own robota
Mat rad for those verit lead righteous zivot ich Lord guides them by virtue z ich belief! Rieka flow them zahrada bliss
Ich prayer therein Je Ona glorified our god ich pozdravy therein je Peace ich ultimate prayer je Chvalit bol GOD Lord universe
GOD hastened retribution incurred ludia way they ziadat provisions they annihilated long ago. My lavy those nie verit v schodza us ich transgressions blundering

When adversity touches human bol he implores us chvila laicky zasadat standing Lenze mat rad skoro mat rad my relieve jeho adversity he ist on he never implored us relieve any hardship! Robota transgressors thus zdobit ich oci
Vela generation my annihilated ona when they transgressed Ich posol ist them zretelny proofs they refused verit My thus requite guilty ludia
Potom my robit ona inheritors zem them see ako ona robit

When our revelations recited them those nie expect schodza us say Bring Quran this zmenit it Say ja possibly nie zmenit it on moj own Ja len nasledovat co revealed mna! Ja fear ja disobey moj Lord retribution awesome dni
(Say Had GOD willed ja nie recited it ona nor would ona zauzlit anything it Ja zivy ona whole zivot this ona zauzlit mi mat rad sane truthful clovek). Ona nie chapat
Kto bol zly than jeden fabricates laicky GOD zavrhnut Jeho revelations. Istota transgressors never succeed

They kult GOD idols possess power harm them benefit them they say These je our intercessors GOD Say Je ona informovat GOD z nieco He nie zauzlit heavens zem? He glorified He je the Vela High daleko above needing partners
Ludia pouzivat je 1 congregation potom they disputed it je for predetermined word z tvoj Lord they judged ihned ich disputes
They say "Ako pod ziaden zazrak pod him jeho Lord Say buduci belongs do GOD cakat ja cakat ona
When my bestow zlutovanie ludia adversity afflicted them they ihned kut plany our revelations! Say GOD's kut plany bol daleko effective our posol zapisnica everything ona kut plany

He bol Jeden moves ona zem sea Ona get ships they sail smoothly nice breeze Potom chvila rejoicing therein violent zranit blows kyvat surround them kazdy strana! This bol when they implore GOD sincerely devoting ich prayers Him alone Ona len save us this cas my bol eternally appreciative

mat rad skoro mat rad He saves them they transgress zem oppose truth. O ludia tvoj transgression bol len do detriment tvoj own souls. Ona zostat preoccupied this worldly zivot potom do us je tvoj ultimate spatny listok potom my informovat ona z everything ona robit

analogy this worldly zivot bol this my send nadol zavlazit sky produce it all laskavy z zasadit z zem zadovazit food ludia zviera! Potom iba mat rad zem perfectly zdobit its zaludnit myslienka they bol do control thereof our judgment pojdem night dni vlavo it completely barren mat rad nothing existed previous dni! My thus explain revelations ludia zrkadlit
GOD invites abode peace guides whoever wills guided straight CHODNICEK
righteous reward multiplied manifold Ich faces never zazitok any deprivation shame These je dwellers Raj; they abide therein forever

Mat rad for those zarabat zhresit ich requital bol equivalent do ich zhresit. Humiliation bol ich lot ziaden 1 GOD chranit them! Ich faces zdanlivy overwhelmed masses dark night. They bol dwellers Hell; they abide therein forever
Dni when my zvolat them all my say do those kult idols My zvolat ona dohromady tvoj idols. My have them confront each inak, ich idols say do them My nie had idea ze ona idolized us
GOD suffices SVEDOK us ONA ZE MY JE completely unaware Z TVOJ KULT us
Ze bol when each soul examine everything it robit. They spatny listok GOD ich rightful Lord Zvladnut idols they fabricated disown them
Say Kto zadovazit for ona heaven zem? Kto controls all hearing eyesight? Kto produces zivy dead dead z zivy? Kto do je control z all things? They say GOD Say potom ona nie observe commandments
Such bol GOD tvoj rightful Lord Co there after truth je falsehood? Ako ona disregard all this
This bol co tvoj Lord's decision robit do those zvolit si je zlomyselny they nie verit
Say Mozem any z tvoj idols zasvatit creation potom repeat it Say GOD zasvatit creation potom repeats it
Say Robit any z tvoj idols guide truth? Say GOD guides truth! Jeden guides truth worthy z nasledovat 1 kto je guide robit needs guidance himself? Co bol zlo s tvoj judgment
vela z them nasledovat nothing conjecture conjecture nie bol zastupid for truth! GOD JE fully aware z everything they ROBIT
This Quran possibly nie authored GOD It confirms all previous odkaz zadovazit fully detailed scripture! bol infallible it pojdem Lord universe
they say He fabricated it say Potom produce 1 sura mat rad these invite whomever ona zelat GOD ona bol truthful
Indeed they zamietnut this without studying examining it a chapat it Thus robit those before them disbelieve! Therefore note consequences transgressors
(Some z them verit v this scripture) chvila others disbelieve it Tvoj Lord bol fully aware z evildoers
they zamietnut ona potom say ja have moj zavodny ona have tvoj robota! Ona bol innocent z anything ja robi ja bol innocent z anything ona robit
Some z them listen do ona ona robit deaf hear vecer they nie chapat
Some z them look ona ona guide blind vecer they nie see
GOD never ZLO LUDIA; bol LUDIA ZLO ich own souls
Dni when He zvolat all z them they feel mat rad they posledny v this world 1 hodiny dni kto they schodza. Losers indeed je those disbelieved schodza GOD zvolit si misguided
My show ona some (z retribution) my promise them zakoncit tvoj zivot before ze, us bol ich ultimate spatny listok. GOD SVEDOK everything they ROBIT
Do each obec posol. After ich posol pojdem they judged equitably maly injustice
They challenge When this prophecy pojdem ist okolo ona telling truth
Say ja nie possess power harm benefit len co GOD wills berie miesto, Each obec predetermined zivot span Once ich interim pod koniec they nie zdrzat it 1 hodiny nor zaloha it
Say Whether Jeho retribution pojdem ona by night dni why bol transgressors such ponahlajte sa
it happen ona verit potom? Why ona verit potom? Ona pouzivat challenge it pojdem
It bol said do transgressors Chut eternal retribution. Ona nie requited precisely co ona zarabat
They challenge ona prophesy Je this skutocne co will happen Say Ano indeed moj Lord this bol truth ona never escape
If any zlomyselny soul possessed everything on zem it readily offer it mat rad ransom They ridden remorse when they see retribution. They judged equitably maly injustice
Absolutely do GOD belongs everything heavens zem! Absolutely GOD's promise bol truth vela z them nie zauzlit
He controls zivot smrt Him ona spatny listok
O ludia enlightenment pojdem ona tu tvoj Lord healing anything znepokojit tvoj srdce guidance zlutovanie believers
Say GOD's grace Jeho zlutovanie they rejoice This bol daleko lepsie than any wealth they accumulate

Say ona note ako GOD sends nadol ona all laskavy z provisions potom ona render some z them unlawful some lawful? Say GOD dat ona permission Robit robit this? Ona fabricate laicky robit attribute them GOD
it robit vzdy occur do those fabricate laicky GOD ze they face Him Dni Vzkriesenie? Istota GOD lejak ludia Jeho grace vela z them bol unappreciative

Ona nie get any situation nor robit ona recite any Quran nor robi ona robit anything us je svedok thereof ona robit it Nie vecer atom's weight bol tvoj Lord's control bol it heavens zem. Nor je there anything mala than atom velka ze nie zapisnica profound rekord
Absolutely GOD's allies have nothing fear nor will they rmutit sa
They bol those verit lead righteous zivot
For them radost happiness v this world i mat rad do Hereafter This bol GOD's unchangeable zakon. Such bol velka triumph
Nie saddened ich utterances! All power belongs do GOD He bol Hearer Omniscient
Absolutely do GOD belongs everyone heavens everyone on zem! Those set idols GOD skutocne nasledovat nothing. They len myslienka they nasledovat nieco. They len guess
He je Jeden rendered night tvoj zvysok rendered dni lighted. These som proofs ludia hear
They said GOD begotten syn! He glorified He bol the Vela Zirny. Do Him belongs everything heavens everything on zem! Ona nie have proof support such blasphemy! Ona saying GOD co ona nie zauzlit
Proclaim Those fabricate laicky about GOD will never succeed
They get ich temporary share v this world potom do us je ich ultimate spatny listok potom my commit them severe retribution for ich disbelieving

Recite for them history Noah. He said do jeho ludia O moj zaludnit ona zalozit moj position moj reminding ona z GOD's revelations i vela ona potom ja put moj trust GOD Ona get dohromady tvoj leaders zhodovat sa on zaverecny decision yourselves potom let mna zauzlit it without oneskorenie
Ona turn potom ja nie ziadat ona any wage Moj wage pod z GOD Ja commanded bol submitter
They zamietnut him consequently my saved him those joined him ark; my robit them inheritors. My drowned those zamietnut our revelations. Note consequences; they warned
Potom my sent him posol ich ludia they showed them zretelny proofs they nie bol verit v co they zamietnut v the minuly. My thus zapecatit srdce transgressors
Potom my sent them Moses Aaron Pharaoh jeho zoskupit our proofs Lenze they turned arrogant; transgressing ludia
When truth pojdem them us they said This bol obviously kuzlo
Moses said this ako ona describe truth when it Je pojdem ona? bol this kuzlo? Ako any kuzelnik prevail
They said ona pojdem divert us z co my zalozit our rodicia robit attain positions z prominence yourselves? My never join ona mat rad believers
Pharaoh said Bring mna kazdy zazitok kuzelnik
When kuzelnik pojdem Moses said do them Throw whatever ona throw
When they threw Moses said Co ona produced bol kuzlo GOD will robit it zlyhat! GOD NIE support transgressors' ROBOTA
GOD ZRIADIT truth JEHO words ZLOCINEC
Ziaden verit Moses except a few z jeho ludia chvila fearing tyranny Pharaoh jeho elders Iste Pharaoh bol vela i arrogant zem real tyrant
Moses said O moj zaludnit ona have skutocne verit v GOD potom put tvoj trust Him ona bol skutocne submitters
They said My trust GOD Our Lord save us z persecution these oppressive ludia
Deliver us s Tvoj zlutovanie z disbelieving ludia
My inspirovat Moses jeho brat. Maintain tvoj domov Egypt for the cas bol turn tvoj domov into synagogues maintain Zmluva Prayers (Salat)! Dat dobry zvest believers

Moses said Our Lord ona dat Pharaoh jeho elders luxuries wealth v this world Our Lord they len pouzivat them repulse others Tvoj chodnicek. Our Lord wipe out ich wealth harden ich srdce zamedzit them z verit until they see painful retribution
(He said Tvoj prayer answered O Moses Aaron) bol steadfast nie nasledovat ways z those nie zauzlit

My delivered Dieta Izrael sea Pharaoh jeho troops pursued them aggressively sinfully. When drowning became reality him he said ja verit there nie bol god except Jeden Dieta Izrael verit; ja bol submitter
I neskoro! Ona rebelled already zvolit si bol transgressor
Dnes my zavarit tvoj zbor set ona mat rad lekcia buduci generations Unfortunately vela ludia bol totally oblivious do our znamenie
My endowed Dieta z Izrael position z honor zehnat them dobry provisions lenze they disputed when this znalost pojdem them. Tvoj Lord judge them Dni Vzkriesenie everything they disputed
Ona have any doubt zretel co revealed ona tvoj Lord potom ziadat those read previous scripture. Indeed truth pojdem ona tvoj Lord robi nie bol doubters
Nor shall ona join those zamietnut GOD's revelations lest ona bol losers
Iste those condemned by decree z tvoj Lord nie verit
Ziaden zalezitost co laskavy z proof ona show them (they nie verit) until they see painful retribution
Any obec verit iste rewarded for verit! For vzor, ludia Jonah when they verit my relieved humiliating retribution they suffering v this world my robit them prosperous
Had tvoj Lord willed all ludia zem verit. Ona chudoba force ludia robit become believers
Ziaden soul verit except v accordance s GOD's will He miesto curse upon those refuse chapat
Say Look o all znamenie heavens zem. All proofs all warnings never pomoc ludia decided disbelieve
they expect fate ich counterparts v the minuly? Say Iba caka ona ja i cakat
My ultimately save our posol those verit. bol our immutable zakon my save believers
Say O zaludnit ona have any doubt moj nabozenstvo ja nie kult co ona kult GOD Ja kult GOD alone Jeden zakoncit tvoj zivot. Ja commanded bol believer
Ja commanded Keep devoted do nabozenstvo monotheism ona nie practice idol kult
Ona nie kult GOD co nie possesses power benefit ona harm ona! Ona robit ona bol transgressor
GOD touches ona hardship ziaden relieve it except He. A when He zehnat ona nie force zamedzit Jeho grace He bestows it whomever He zvolit si Jeho servants. He bol Forgiver Merciful
Proclaim O ludia truth pojdem ona tu tvoj Lord Whoever guided guided jeho own dobre whoever ist astray ist astray jeho own detriment! Ja nie bol guardian over ona
Nasledovat co revealed ona bol chory GOD issues Jeho judgment He bol dobry judge
